elements.name: question1
elements.title: Which statements are correct? Put a cross in the box.
choices: The greenhouse effect is a natural phenomenon. Without the greenhouse effect, life would not be possible as temperatures would be too low.
The greenhouse effect is intensified by human activities. Today we are speculating about the consequences of this increased greenhouse effect.
The consequences of the increased greenhouse effect can be accurately predicted. It is therefore possible to take rapid and targeted protective measures against the effects of climate change.
correctAnswer: The greenhouse effect is a natural phenomenon. Without the greenhouse effect, life would not be possible as temperatures would be too low.
The greenhouse effect is intensified by human activities. Today we are speculating about the consequences of this increased greenhouse effect.
